name: sofar inverter
info:
TCP server for LSW3 wifi logger  
used with Sofar inverters

## Supported inverters

Sofar KTL-X  
Sofar KTLX-G3  
Sofar ME3000SP  
Sofar HYD6000-ES  

### Outputs
1. JSON data
: payload (object) : parsed data object.
: topic (string) : frame data type.

2. debug
: payload (buffer) : raw data from inverter.
: topic (string) : message origin.
: frameType (string) : frame data type.

### Details

Default local server port:  
`10000`

Default host IP:  
`47.88.8.200` (`data1.solarmanpv.com`)  
or  
`115.29.186.234` (`data2.solarmanpv.com`)  

Default port nr:  
`10000`

### References

 - [GitHub](https://github.com/serek4/node-red-sofar-inverter) - the node github repository

meta.author: serek4
meta.desc: sofar inverter with LSW3 wifi logger

name: generate response
decode msg
add msg.frameType
